properties.name: Amenia Rail Trail
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr amenia,nypaved rail trail for easy riding through scenic areas. not much incline but great distance riding about 10 miles but could be wrong.

properties.name: Biale Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by BikejestrFirst winery on my tour. they were great and had the Black chicken Zinfindel. good people ,great wine!

properties.name: Cakebread Winery
properties.description: Posted by BikejestrThe Great wine adventure second stop and my favorate,good whites and great recipes for pairing with food.

properties.name: Home of the great poet that don't know it.
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr 13 eastman terrace, poughkeepsie, nyI nutty sort of personality with tons of information. Just ask him about his writing.

properties.name: Joe's Taco Shack
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestrthe best food in Mill Valley!!! love it!

properties.name: Little Five points
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestratlanta,ga.The old stomping grounds of the Jester.a great place for freaks.

properties.name: Minnawaska Bike Trails
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr  many miles of great bike riding trails as well as climbing and very scenic vistas.trails connect to mohonk and the riding is GREAT.

properties.name: Mohank Mountain Trails
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr good riding for mountain bikes. great trails and rock climbing. even with the park rangers harassing you and snakes, i found this to be the greatest ride so far.

properties.name: New Paltz Rail trail to Rosendale
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr  a very nice rail trail with about 11 mile distance to the railroad bridge in rosendale. not much for the trill seekers, but some nice riding for building up lungs and legs. the rosendale bridge is a nice spot for a rest before the ride back.

properties.name: Norrie Point
properties.description: Posted by BikejestrGreat place to have a picnic and explore the woods.This is a park, right on the water, perfect for launching small boats and exploring the area.

properties.name: Out of the way park
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestrnice place to sit and read, just close enough to get to class or work.

properties.name: TWIST restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr  4290 albany post rd,hydepark,ny,12538The best restaurant I have ever been to!!

properties.name: TWIST restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr 4290 albany post rd,hydepark,ny,12538best restuarant in the valley!

properties.name: Tap New York
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestrbeer event including 40 brewerys from the new york area, highlights where double ipa\'s and smoked porters.

properties.name: The original Bus Stop at Fourth Ward
properties.description: Posted by BikejestrA start to the ATL club scene that was pure and run by people that were themselfs Freaks! Oh how i miss them! Patch, Banchee, Jester,Hemi,and All the other Artist/freaks. this mark is for the bubble gum posse and the crazys. thanks for the memories.

properties.name: Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr    The Vanderbilt Estate in Hyde Park, New York is perhaps the best, most intact example of the types of estates constructed by wealthy industrialists in the 19th century. The fully-furnished, 54-room mansion is placed in a wondrous landscape with breathtaking views of the Hudson River and distant Catskill Mountains. It offers a glimpse into a past world known by only an elite few.

properties.name: Vassar Trails
properties.description: Posted by BikejestrThe crazy bike trails that you might not survive. mr. bojangles is the easy one.

properties.name: home of organicmoods
properties.description: Posted by Bikejestr39-d cedar street, san anselmo, Cagoing for vacation!
